casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Justin Mark WOLSCHLAGER, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158881
COA: 346727 Supreme Court of Michigan. January 9, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for immediate consideration is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the December 21, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court. The motion for stay is DENIED.
